content: > this pattern is a gift from me to you > *black cat basics patterns are designed for beginner knitters who want to make something they will actually want to wear * *the basics cowl is an excellent first knitting project as it s knit at with no increasing or decreasing and only uses knit stitch * *the moebius construction makes this cowl something even experienced knitters will want to make and wear * **needles** 5 mm/us size 8 straight or circular needle s cowl is worked flat **notions** tapestry needle for finishing **yarn** any worsted weight/10 ply or heavy dk that can achieve gauge quantity needed approx 174metres/190yards total shown here malabrigo rios in colorway cirrus grey **finished size** finished cowl measures approx 48cm/19in in circumference and 21 5cm/8 5in tall
